Package ca.griis.ontorelquery.exception

Class ConfigurationException

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Throwable
java.lang.Exception
ca.griis.ontorelquery.exception.OntoRelQueryException
ca.griis.ontorelquery.exception.ConfigurationException
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class ConfigurationException extends OntoRelQueryException
Exception specific to configuration operations in the OntoRelQuery project. This exception is thrown when errors occur during configuration loading, validation, or access.

Object Properties

  • Unicity: yes (uniqueness of each exception instance).
  • Clonability: no (exceptions should not be cloned).
  • Modifiability: no (exceptions are immutable once thrown).

  • Constructor Details

    • ConfigurationException

      public ConfigurationException(String message)
      Constructs a ConfigurationException with a message. The message is prefixed with "Configuration error: " for better error identification.
      Parameters:
      message - Detailed error message.

    • ConfigurationException

      public ConfigurationException(Throwable cause)
      Constructs a ConfigurationException with a throwable cause.
      Parameters:
      cause - Throwable cause of the exception.

    • ConfigurationException

      public ConfigurationException(String message, Throwable cause)
      Constructs a ConfigurationException with both a message and a throwable cause. The message is prefixed with "Configuration error: " for better error identification.
      Parameters:
      message - Detailed error message.
      cause - Throwable cause of the exception.

  • Method Details

    • missingConfigFile

      public static ConfigurationException missingConfigFile(String filePath)
      Creates a ConfigurationException for a missing configuration file error.
      Parameters:
      filePath - The path of the missing configuration file.
      Returns:
      A new ConfigurationException instance.

    • missingRequiredProperty

      public static ConfigurationException missingRequiredProperty(String propertyName)
      Creates a ConfigurationException for a missing required property error.
      Parameters:
      propertyName - The name of the missing property.
      Returns:
      A new ConfigurationException instance.

    • invalidPropertyValue

      public static ConfigurationException invalidPropertyValue(String propertyName, String propertyValue)
      Creates a ConfigurationException for an invalid property value error.
      Parameters:
      propertyName - The name of the property with an invalid value.
      propertyValue - The invalid value.
      Returns:
      A new ConfigurationException instance.

    • loadingError

      public static ConfigurationException loadingError(String filePath, Throwable cause)
      Creates a ConfigurationException for a configuration loading error.
      Parameters:
      filePath - The path of the configuration file that could not be loaded.
      cause - The cause of the loading error.
      Returns:
      A new ConfigurationException instance.

    • databaseConnectionError

      public static ConfigurationException databaseConnectionError(String serverInfo, Throwable cause)
      Creates a ConfigurationException for a database connection error.
      Parameters:
      serverInfo - The server information (host, port, database).
      cause - The cause of the connection error.
      Returns:
      A new ConfigurationException instance.
